description: The Mummy: Surveying all the tomb adventure is BrycePierce, the mummy, who comes to life in a scene that garnered BestPicture, Best Director, and Best Sex Scene nominations. Theincredible thing about this scene is that it sounds so strange, but it isperhaps the finest sex performance ever recorded on tape. Ratherthan comment further, let it suffice to say that this scene is requiredviewing for all fans of Chris Ward, J.D. Slater, and Raging StallionStudios. It is a triumph that is universally acknowledged as being asgood as porn gets.
title: Raiders Of The Lost Arse, Scene #06
